description:
Takizawa, Saki, and Micchon pay a visit to Panties, a reclusive geek who might have the skills to repair Kondo’s phone. Across town, Ohsugi doesn’t like what he finds after looking into Takizawa’s identity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A la recherche de ce voyage que nous avions manqué
Searching for the Path Already Lost
あらかじめ失われた道程をさがして
